title: The Best Foods to Eat for Weight Loss
summary: The best foods for weight loss are natural unprocessed foods. Fat, protein and carbohydrates are the three main macronutrients found in food. Fat and protein are “slow burning” or “thermogenic” nutrients. Carbohydrates have been given a bad reputation for making people fat, but the truth is that not all carbs are bad. Eating too many fruits can cause weight gain because they have approximately as many calories as other sugary foods. Whole grains are rich in B vitamins, iron, magnesium, manganese, selenium and zinc, which are essential for good health.
